cards.subject: Experience the Unmatched Power of iPhone 15 Pro!
cards.preview: Get to know the all-new iPhone 15 Pro!
cards.prompt: Generate an engaging email introducing the iPhone 15 Pro to window shoppers.
cards.emailContent:
Dear [Customer Name],

We thought you might be interested in the all-new iPhone 15 Pro. Packed with advanced technology, stunning visuals, and unmatched performance, it's a device that truly stands apart.

Don't just take our word for it, come and experience the power of the iPhone 15 Pro yourself! 

Best,
[Your Name]
cards.imagePrompt: Generate an image showcasing the sleek design and advanced features of the iPhone 15 Pro.

cards.subject: You're One Step Away From Owning an iPhone 15 Pro!
cards.preview: Don't miss out on the iPhone 15 Pro!
cards.prompt: Generate a follow-up email for customers who added the iPhone 15 Pro to their cart but abandoned the purchase.
cards.emailContent:
Dear [Customer Name],

We noticed you left a shiny new iPhone 15 Pro in your cart. Don't miss out on the chance to experience this incredible device. Complete your purchase today! 

Best,
[Your Name]
cards.imagePrompt: Generate an image showing the iPhone 15 Pro in a shopping cart to remind the customer of their abandoned purchase.
